1.name: Strangers on a Train
1.description: A psychopath forces a tennis star to comply with his theory that two strangers can get away with murder.

2.name: A Streetcar Named Desire
2.description: Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.

3.name: Payment on Demand
3.description: The film is about divorce but with flashbacks as to why divorce occurs.

4.name: Alice in Wonderland
4.description: Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.

5.name: The Thing from Another World
5.description: Scientists and American Air Force officials fend off a bloodthirsty alien organism while at a remote arctic outpost.

6.name: The Day the Earth Stood Still
6.description: An alien lands and tells the people of Earth that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets.

7.name: Westward the Women
7.description: A trail guide escorts a group of women from Chicago to California to marry men that have recently began settling there.

8.name: Quo Vadis
8.description: Fierce Roman commander Marcus Vinicius becomes infatuated with beautiful Christian hostage Lygia and begins questioning the tyrannical leadership of the despot Emperor Nero.

9.name: The African Queen
9.description: In Africa during World War I, a gin-swilling riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack an enemy warship.

10.name: David and Bathsheba
10.description: After King David sees the beautiful Bathsheba bathing from the palace roof, he enters into an adulterous affair which has tragic consequences for his family and Israel.

11.name: Ace in the Hole
11.description: A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to re-jump start his career, but the situation quickly escalates into an out-of-control circus.

12.name: Goodbye, My Fancy
12.description: Congresswoman Agatha Reed returns to her alma mater for homecoming, although she's more interested in renewing her romance with an old flame who's now the college president. Their attempts ...                See full summary »

13.name: Native Son
13.description: In 1940s Chicago, a young black man takes a job as a chauffeur to a white family, which takes a turn for the worse when he accidentally kills the teenage daughter of the couple and then tries to cover it up.

14.name: An American in Paris
14.description: Three friends struggle to find work in Paris. Things become more complicated when two of them fall in love with the same woman.

15.name: A Place in the Sun
15.description: A poor boy gets a job working for his rich uncle and ends up falling in love with two women.

16.name: The Son of Dr. Jekyll
16.description: Edward Jekyll, ignorant of how his father had brought forth death and destruction with his experiments, is pursuing a chemist career despite the fact that he has been discharged from school...                See full summary »

17.name: Utopia
17.description: Stan inherits a yacht and a South Pacific island. Ollie and Stan sail there with 2 other men. They shipwreck on a new atoll and settle there. An ex-fiancee joins them. They declare an independent nation and problems arise.

18.name: On Dangerous Ground
18.description: Rough city cop Jim Wilson is disciplined by his captain and is sent upstate, to a snowy mountain town, to help the local sheriff solve a murder case.

19.name: Sirocco
19.description: A cynical American expatriate gets involved in smuggling and gun-running for the rebels during the 1925 Syrian insurgency against French occupation.

20.name: Man in the Saddle
20.description: A private deadly feud ensues when ruthless wealthy rancher Will Isham attempts a takeover of small rancher Owen Merritt's land and marries Owen's old flame, Laure Bidwell.

21.name: Show Boat
21.description: The daughter of a riverboat captain falls in love with a charming gambler, but their fairytale romance is threatened when his luck turns sour.

22.name: Red Mountain
22.description: In 1865 Confederate Capt. Sherwood is heading to Colorado where Confederate Gen. Quantrill is stirring up rebellion using various Indian Nations.

23.name: A Christmas Carol
23.description: An old bitter miser is given a chance for redemption when he is haunted by three ghosts on Christmas Eve...

24.name: Another Man's Poison
24.description: In an isolated house, mystery writer Janet Frobisher is involved in potentially murderous relationships.

25.name: When Worlds Collide
25.description: As a new star and planet hurtle toward a doomed Earth, a small group of survivalists frantically work to complete the rocket which will take them to their new home.

26.name: Texas Carnival
26.description: A showmen team is mistaken for a cattle baron and his sister.

27.name: The Prowler
27.description: When Susan Gilvray reports a prowler outside her house police officer Webb Garwood investigates and sparks fly. If only her husband wasn't in the way.

28.name: Along the Great Divide
28.description: A U.S. Marshall and two deputies rescue a cattle rustler from a lynch mob led by a local cattle baron convinced that the rustler also killed his son.

29.name: Captain Horatio Hornblower R.N.
29.description: During the Napoleonic wars, a British Navy Captain has adventures in Central American waters.

30.name: The Lavender Hill Mob
30.description: A meek bank clerk who oversees the shipment of bullion joins with an eccentric neighbor to steal gold bars and smuggle them out of the country as miniature Eiffel Towers.

31.name: Vengeance Valley
31.description: The sons of a Colorado cattle baron, one biological and the other adopted, resent one another and fight for control of their father's cattle empire.

32.name: Royal Wedding
32.description: A brother and sister dance act encounter challenges and romance when booked in London during the Royal Wedding.

33.name: M
33.description: In this Americanization of the 1931 German thriller, both the police and the criminal underworld stalk a mysterious killer who preys on small children.

34.name: Diary of a Country Priest
34.description: A young priest taking over the parish at Ambricourt tries to fulfill his duties even as he fights a mysterious stomach ailment.

35.name: Othello
35.description: The Moorish General Othello is manipulated into thinking that his new wife Desdemona has been carrying on an affair with his Lieutenant Michael Cassio when in reality, it is all part of the scheme of a bitter Ensign named Iago.

36.name: Best of the Badmen
36.description: The outlaws of the Clanton and Younger gangs are the heroes of this fictionalized biography.

37.name: The Man in the White Suit
37.description: An altruistic chemist invents a fabric which resists wear and stain as a boon to humanity, but big business and labor realize it must be suppressed for economic reasons.

38.name: His Kind of Woman
38.description: A deported gangster's plan to re-enter the USA involves skulduggery at a Mexican resort, and gambler Dan Milner is caught in the middle.

39.name: Early Summer
39.description: A family chooses a match for their daughter Noriko, but she, surprisingly, has her own plans.

40.name: The River
40.description: Three adolescent girls growing up in Bengal, India, learn their lessons in life after falling for an older American soldier.

41.name: Pandora and the Flying Dutchman
41.description: A seductive woman falls in love with a mysterious ship's captain.

42.name: No Highway in the Sky
42.description: An aeronautical engineer predicts that a new model of plane will fail catastrophically and in a novel manner after a specific number flying hours.

43.name: Detective Story
43.description: On one day in the 21st Precinct squad room, assorted characters form a backdrop for the troubles of hard-nosed Detective Jim McLeod.

44.name: Valley of the Eagles
44.description: A Norwegian scientist builds a device that can convert sound waves into electrical energy. However, the machine is stolen by the scientist's wife and assistant, who head across the frozen ...                See full summary »

45.name: The Great Missouri Raid
45.description: In this Western, the James and Younger boys ride the outlaw trail again all because of a mean Union Army Major.

46.name: Summer Interlude
46.description: A lonely woman recalls her first love thirteen years prior during a brief summer vacation.

47.name: People Will Talk
47.description: Dr. Noah Praetorius falls in love with Debra, a student who finds out that she is pregnant by her old boyfriend.

48.name: Miracle in Milan
48.description: An open hearted and unrelentingly energetic orphan struggles to make the best out of his life on the streets of Milan.

49.name: Let's Make It Legal
49.description: The nearly-final divorce of the Halsworths suddenly gets complicated when Miriam's old flame comes to town.

50.name: Distant Drums
50.description: After destroying a Seminole fort, American soldiers and their rescued companions must face the dangerous Everglades and hostile Indians in order to reach safety.
